Summary: American Express (AXP) faces direct legislative risk (-0.95) from one bill, with a 1% tax impact. No indirect risks. Overall risk: low. One direct impact analyzed.
SummaryKeypoints: H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes 1% tax. affecting operations in United States. with immediate implementation The legislation states: "There is hereby imposed on any remittance transfer a tax equal to 1 percent of the amount of such transfer."
